001package com.fns.grivet.repo;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.Map;
005import java.util.stream.Collectors;
006
007import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;
008
009import com.fns.grivet.model.AttributeType;
010
011@Repository
012public class AttributeTypeRepository {
013
014    private static Map<String, AttributeType> nameMap = Arrays.stream(AttributeType.values()).collect(Collectors.toMap(k -> k.getType(), k -> k));
015    private static Map<Integer, AttributeType> idMap = Arrays.stream(AttributeType.values()).collect(Collectors.toMap(k -> k.getId(), k -> k));
016
017    public AttributeType findByType(String type) {
018        return nameMap.get(type);
019    }
020
021    public AttributeType findById(Integer id) {
022        return idMap.get(id);
023    }
024
025}
